resources.string: Er du sikker på at du vil slette dette POI

As a digital nomad, you know that the key to traveling the world is being able to stay connected. And with your busy lifestyle, you don't have time to research long lists of travel apps. That's why we built the world's most comprehensive app for digital nomads. With our app, you can visit places with visual descriptions of the areas (POI – points of interest)

 When the user is near the area he/she can take up the camera and observe graphics with associated text related to the place.

 App has built in features such as menu to edit settings, language, theme etc.

Temporary views for: MAP, CAMERA, GRAPH, INFORMATION

Raw and filtered Sensor recording of accelerometer, gyroscope

Computed orientation using accelerometer and magnetometer

Visualization of the sensor data with orientation
This app was developed during a student project by a team (Team ID=6) of three members:

Magnus Roald Ree 
Tore Bjerkan Tore Bjerkan
Sharmila Ratnasingam

Her får brukeren muligheten til å spore egen aktivitet. Ved å trykke start begynner appen å spore bevegelsene. Appen tegner en linje langs stien der brukeren forflytter seg. I tilfelle markøren til brukeren ikke er synlig, er det mulig å trykke \'here\' for sentrere kartet på markøren.
